columns.dc:description: The name of the organisation to which the dataset relates.
The Uniform Resource Identifier which contains the description of the organisation.
The financial year to which the data relates in the format YYYY/YY.
The total number of public funerals provided within the period.
The total cost in GBP of providing the funerals. NA indicates that the information was not recorded.
The number of funerals out of the total which were provided as burials.
The number of funerals out of the total which were provided as cremations.
